name: TwistTales
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: twist tales
des:
Play your own story! In these interactive mystery, science fiction and fantasy stories, you get to be the hero and decide what happens. 

Start the Skill with "Alexa, open Twist Tales" and choose your story.

With "Alexa, back to menu" it’s easy to return to the menu and select another story.

If you enjoyed the stories, we'd love to hear a review here in the Skill Store!

+++ Discover more interactive audio stories: twist-tales.com +++

EarReality - Content marketing agency & publisher for interactive audiobooks for Voice technology, Web & App.

TWIST Tales was created with „TWIST“, The Wonderful Interactive Storytelling Tool.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
